title: Monsanto 's number of regular and temporary workers worldwide 2013 to 2017
summary: This grouped bar chart has 2 categories for the x axis of Worker Type representing 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, and 2017.
The highest category is found at Regular workers with a mean value of 21620.0.
The second highest category is found at Temporary workers with a mean value of 3600.0.
